item.Q:
Write the character:
1: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
2: doctor
item.A:
1: dà 2: dài
广大 (廣大) guǎngdà vast; extensive 大夫 dàifu doctor; minister of state (in pre-Han states)

item.Q:
Write the character:
many; much; a lot of; numerous; multi-
item.A:
duō
许多 (許多) xǔduō many; a lot of; much

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: number; figure; to count; to calculate; several
2: to count
item.A:
traditional: 數
1: shù 2: shǔ
数量 (數量) shùliàng amount; quantity 倒数 (倒數) dàoshǔ (v) count down; count backward

item.Q:
Write the character:
to use; to act; to move; to change
item.A:
traditional: 動
dòng
运动 (運動) yùndòng movement; campaign; sports

item.Q:
Write the character:
thing; object; matter; abbr. for physics 物理
item.A:
wù
物质 (物質) wùzhì matter; substance; material; materialistic

wǔ
五年计划 (五年計劃) wǔniánjìhuà Five-Year Plan

item.Q:
Write the character:
official; government; organ of body
item.A:
官 (strokes unavailable)
guān
官僚 guānliáo official; bureaucrat; government employee who doesn't do any work

item.Q:
Write the character:
to look at; to regard; to inspect
item.A:
traditional: 視
shì
重视 (重視) zhòngshì to attach importance to sth; to value

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: feel; find that; thinking; awake; aware
2: a nap; a sleep
item.A:
traditional: 覺
1: jué 2: jiào
觉得 (覺得) juéde to think; to feel 幻觉 (幻覺) huànjiào hallucination

traditional: 聽
tīng
听说 (聽說) tīngshuō to hear told

chù

wèi
意味着 (意味著) yìwèizhe signify; mean; imply

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: feel; find that; thinking; awake; aware
2: a nap; a sleep
item.A:
traditional: 覺
1: jué 2: jiào

item.Q:
Write the character:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
item.A:
rán
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
item.A:
ér
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character:
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
item.A:
traditional: 發
fā
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character:
attain; pass through; achieve; reach; realize; clear; inform; notify; dignity
item.A:
traditional: 達
dá
达到 (達到) dádào to reach; to achieve; to attain

item.Q:
Write the character:
to lift; to hold up; to cite; to enumerate; to act; to raise; to choose; to elect
item.A:
举 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 舉
jǔ
举行 (舉行) jǔxíng to hold (a meeting, ceremony etc)

item.Q:
Write the character:
example; precedent; rule; case; instance
item.A:
lì
例如 lìrú for example; for instance; such as

traditional: 來
lái
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

item.Q:
Write the character:
to speak; to say; a theory (usually in compounds such as 日心说 heliocentric theory)
item.A:
traditional: 說
shuō
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character:
prefix used before the surname a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person)
item.A:
lǎo
老人 lǎorén old people; the aged

鹰 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 鷹
yīng

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: surname
2: high; tall
item.A:
1: Gāo 2: gāo
提高 tígāo raise; increase 提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: air; sky; empty; free time; in vain
2: emptied; leisure
item.A:
1: kōng 2: kòng
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere 空隙 kòngxì crack; gap between two objects; gap in time between two events

item.Q:
Write the character:
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
item.A:
traditional: 發
fā
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character:
appear; present; now; existing; current
item.A:
traditional: 現
xiàn
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

爬 (strokes unavailable)
pá
爬行 páxíng crawl; creep

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: all right; capable; competent; OK; okay; to go; to do; to travel; temporary; to walk; to go; will do
2: a row; profession; professional
item.A:
1: xíng 2: háng
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute 银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

rén
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character:
kind; type; class; category; similar; like; to resemble
item.A:
类 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 類
lèi
人类 (人類) rénlèi humanity; human race; mankind

蜥 (strokes unavailable)
xī

蜴 (strokes unavailable)
yì

item.Q:
Write the character:
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
item.A:
traditional: 無
wú
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character:
law; method; way; Buddhist teaching; Legalist; abbr. for France
item.A:
fǎ
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

模 (strokes unavailable)
mó
规模 (規模) guīmó scale; scope; extent

糊 (strokes unavailable)
hú
糊涂 (糊塗) hútu muddled; silly; confused

jìn
最近 zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

item.Q:
Write the character:
to look at; to regard; to inspect
item.A:
traditional: 視
shì
重视 (重視) zhòngshì to attach importance to sth; to value

yǎn
眼睛 yǎnjing eye

辨 (strokes unavailable)
biàn
辨别 (辨別) biànbié differentiate; distinguish; discriminate

item.Q:
Write the character:
leave; depart; separate; distinguish; classify; other; another; do not; must not; to pin
item.A:
traditional: 別
bié
分别 (分別) fēnbié difference; distinction; apart; separate; separately; respectively

item.Q:
Write the character:
(two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply
item.A:
bèi
倍数 (倍數) bèishù multiple

item.Q:
Write the character:
(particle used for comparison and "-er than"); to compare; to contrast; to gesture (with hands); ratio
item.A:
bǐ
比较 (比較) bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

item.A:
taste
意味着 (意味著) yìwèizhe signify; mean; imply

item.Q:
Write the character: jué
(juéde de jué)
item.A:
traditional: 覺
feel; find that; thinking; awake; aware
觉得 (覺得) juéde to think; to feel

item.Q:
Write the character: jiào
(huànjiào de jiào)
item.A:
traditional: 覺
a nap; a sleep
幻觉 (幻覺) huànjiào hallucination

item.Q:
Write the character: rán
(ránhòu de rán)
item.A:
correct; right; so; thus; like this; -ly
然后 (然後) ránhòu after; then (afterwards); after that; afterwards

item.Q:
Write the character: ér
(érqiě de ér)
item.A:
and; as well as; but (not); yet (not); (shows causal relation); (shows change of state); (shows contrast)
而且 érqiě not only ... but also; as well as; moreover; in addition; furthermore

item.Q:
Write the character: fā
(fāzhǎn de fā)
item.A:
traditional: 發
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character: dá
(dádào de dá)
item.A:
traditional: 達
attain; pass through; achieve; reach; realize; clear; inform; notify; dignity
达到 (達到) dádào to reach; to achieve; to attain

item.Q:
Write the character: jǔ
(jǔxíng de jǔ)
item.A:
举 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 舉
to lift; to hold up; to cite; to enumerate; to act; to raise; to choose; to elect
举行 (舉行) jǔxíng to hold (a meeting, ceremony etc)

item.Q:
Write the character: lì
(lìrú de lì)
item.A:
example; precedent; rule; case; instance
例如 lìrú for example; for instance; such as

item.Q:
Write the character: lái
(chūlái de lái)
item.A:
traditional: 來
to come
出来 (出來) chūlái to come out; to emerge

item.Q:
Write the character: shuō
(shuōmíng de shuō)
item.A:
traditional: 說
to speak; to say; a theory (usually in compounds such as 日心说 heliocentric theory)
说明 (說明) shuōmíng to explain; to illustrate; explanation; directions; caption

item.Q:
Write the character: lǎo
(lǎorén de lǎo)
item.A:
prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity; old (of people); venerable (person)
老人 lǎorén old people; the aged

鹰 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 鷹
eagle; falcon; hawk

item.Q:
Write the character: Gāo
(tígāo de Gāo)
item.A:
surname Gao
提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character: gāo
(tígāo de gāo)
item.A:
high; tall
提高 tígāo raise; increase

item.Q:
Write the character: kōng
(kōngqì de kōng)
item.A:
air; sky; empty; free time; in vain
空气 (空氣) kōngqì air; atmosphere

item.Q:
Write the character: kòng
(kòngxì de kòng)
item.A:
emptied; leisure
空隙 kòngxì crack; gap between two objects; gap in time between two events

item.Q:
Write the character: fā
(fāzhǎn de fā)
item.A:
traditional: 發
to send out; to show (one's feeling); to issue; to develop; (classifier for gunshots, "rounds")
发展 (發展) fāzhǎn development; growth; to develop; to grow; to expand

item.Q:
Write the character: xiàn
(xiànzài de xiàn)
item.A:
traditional: 現
appear; present; now; existing; current
现在 (現在) xiànzài now; at present; modern; current; nowadays

item.Q:
Write the character: pá
(páxíng de pá)
item.A:
爬 (strokes unavailable)
crawl; climb
爬行 páxíng crawl; creep

item.Q:
Write the character: xíng
(jìnxíng de xíng)
item.A:
all right; capable; competent; OK; okay; to go; to do; to travel; temporary; to walk; to go; will do
进行 (進行) jìnxíng to advance; to conduct; underway; in progress; to do; to carry out; to carry on; to conduct; to execute

item.Q:
Write the character: háng
(yínháng de háng)
item.A:
a row; profession; professional
银行 (銀行) yínháng bank

item.Q:
Write the character: rén
(rénmín de rén)
item.A:
man; person; people
人民 rénmín (the) people

item.Q:
Write the character: lèi
(rénlèi de lèi)
item.A:
类 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 類
kind; type; class; category; similar; like; to resemble
人类 (人類) rénlèi humanity; human race; mankind

蜥 (strokes unavailable)
chameleon; Eumeces latiscutatus

蜴 (strokes unavailable)
chameleon; Eumeces latiscutatus

item.Q:
Write the character: wú
(wúchǎnjiējí de wú)
item.A:
traditional: 無
-less; not to have; no; none; not; to lack; un-
无产阶级 (無產階級) wúchǎnjiējí proletariat

item.Q:
Write the character: fǎ
(fāngfǎ de fǎ)
item.A:
law; method; way; Buddhist teaching; Legalist; abbr. for France
方法 fāngfǎ method; way; means

item.Q:
Write the character: mó
(guīmó de mó)
item.A:
模 (strokes unavailable)
type of
规模 (規模) guīmó scale; scope; extent

item.Q:
Write the character: hú
(hútu de hú)
item.A:
糊 (strokes unavailable)
muddled; paste; scorched
糊涂 (糊塗) hútu muddled; silly; confused

item.Q:
Write the character: jìn
(zuìjìn de jìn)
item.A:
near; close (to); approximately
最近 zuìjìn recent; recently; soon

item.Q:
Write the character: shì
(zhòngshì de shì)
item.A:
traditional: 視
to look at; to regard; to inspect
重视 (重視) zhòngshì to attach importance to sth; to value

item.Q:
Write the character: yǎn
(yǎnjing de yǎn)
item.A:
eye
眼睛 yǎnjing eye

item.Q:
Write the character: biàn
(biànbié de biàn)
item.A:
辨 (strokes unavailable)
distinguish; recognize
辨别 (辨別) biànbié differentiate; distinguish; discriminate

item.Q:
Write the character: bié
(fēnbié de bié)
item.A:
traditional: 別
leave; depart; separate; distinguish; classify; other; another; do not; must not; to pin
分别 (分別) fēnbié difference; distinction; apart; separate; separately; respectively

item.Q:
Write the character: bèi
(bèishù de bèi)
item.A:
(two, three etc) -fold; times (multiplier); double; to increase or multiply
倍数 (倍數) bèishù multiple

item.Q:
Write the character: bǐ
(bǐjiào de bǐ)
item.A:
(particle used for comparison and "-er than"); to compare; to contrast; to gesture (with hands); ratio
比较 (比較) bǐjiào compare; contrast; fairly; comparatively; relatively; quite; rather

traditional: 大多數
dàduōshù (great) majority

traditional: 動物
dòngwù animal

traditional: 視覺
shìjué sight; visual

traditional: 聽覺
tīngjué sense of hearing

traditional: 嗅覺
xiùjiào olfaction
xiùjué sense of smell

traditional: 味覺
wèijiào gustation
wèijué basic taste
ránér however; yet; but

traditional: 發達
fādá developed (country etc); flourishing; to develop

traditional: 舉例來說
jǔlìláishuō for example
gāokōng (n) high altitude

traditional: 發現
fāxiàn to find; to discover
páxíng crawl; creep

traditional: 人類
rénlèi humanity; human race; mankind
xīyì lizard

traditional: 無法
wúfǎ unable; incapable
móhu vague; indistinct; fuzzy

traditional: 近視眼
jìnshìyǎn nearsightedness

traditional: 辨別
biànbié differentiate; distinguish; discriminate
